oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Teachers from India visit with Mayor Briley, 1964 July 17
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of educators from India meet with Mayor Beverly Briley on July 17th, 1964 in Nashville, Tennessee. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 4 photograph negatives : b & w ; 4 x 5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
